name: The Capybaran vs. The Catpocalopse
description:
The courageous Capybaran sets off to defeat the terrifying one-eyed Catpocalopse and his band of feline fighters. 

Every ten seconds you get a choice between two upgrades, but be careful - the enemies get upgrades too.

Playable on Windows.

The game jam build has bugs and severe balancing issues. We'll be improving and expanding on the game in the coming weeks.

Controls

Alt + Enter: Fullscreen (May look incorrect on aspect ratios other than 16:9)

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Shoot

Shift: Slow

Created by:
